channel.title: CVE Feed for DJI -- Mini 3 Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DJI -- Mini 3 Pro

item.title: CVE-2023-6949|2024-08-27T14:57:47.352Z -- dji -- mini%203%20pro
item.description: A Missing Authentication for Critical Function issue affecting the HTTP service running on the DJI Mavic Mini 3 Pro on the standard port 80 could allow an attacker to enumerate and download videos and pictures saved on the drone internal or external memory without requiring any kind of authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-6949|2024-04-02T10:27:44.079Z -- dji -- mini%203%20pro
item.description: A Missing Authentication for Critical Function issue affecting the HTTP service running on the DJI Mavic Mini 3 Pro on the standard port 80 could allow an attacker to enumerate and download videos and pictures saved on the drone internal or external memory without requiring any kind of authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-6950|2024-04-02T10:27:54.813Z -- dji -- mini%203%20pro
item.description: An Improper Input Validation vulnerability affecting the FTP service running on the DJI Mavic Mini 3 Pro could allow an attacker to craft a malicious packet containing a malformed path provided to the FTP SIZE command that leads to a denial-of-service attack of the FTP service itself.

item.title: CVE-2023-6950|2024-08-02T08:42:08.688Z -- dji -- mini%203%20pro
item.description: An Improper Input Validation vulnerability affecting the FTP service running on the DJI Mavic Mini 3 Pro could allow an attacker to craft a malicious packet containing a malformed path provided to the FTP SIZE command that leads to a denial-of-service attack of the FTP service itself.

item.title: CVE-2023-6949|2024-08-02T08:42:08.539Z -- dji -- mini%203%20pro
item.description: A Missing Authentication for Critical Function issue affecting the HTTP service running on the DJI Mavic Mini 3 Pro on the standard port 80 could allow an attacker to enumerate and download videos and pictures saved on the drone internal or external memory without requiring any kind of authentication.
